QueryViewSpec.Name: Prospect Terminate Pre Business Process Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Prospect Terminate Pre Business Process Query
QueryViewSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: select s.ID, c.LOOKUPID as SPONSORID, c.[NAME] as SPONSORNAME, so.LOOKUPID as CHILDID, soc.[NAME] as CHILDNAME, sc.LOOKUPID as SPONCOMMITMENTID, rpm.PAYMENTMETHOD, rev.LOOKUPID as REVENUEID, rgactivity.AMOUNT as PAYMENTAMOUNT, s.STARTDATE as SONSORSHIPSTARTDATE from dbo.sponsorship s left join dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION se ON se.ID = s.ID left join dbo.USR_CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE currentStatus ON currentStatus .ID = se.CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODEID left join dbo.REVENUESPLIT revsplit on s.REVENUESPLITID = revsplit.ID left join dbo.REVENUE rev on revsplit.REVENUEID = rev.ID left join dbo.RECURRINGGIFTACTIVITY as rgactivity on rgactivity.SOURCEREVENUEID = rev.ID left join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTIONLINEITEM as payment on payment.ID = rgactivity.PAYMENTREVENUEID left join dbo.USR_FINANCIALTRANSACTION_EXTENSION fte on fte.ID = revsplit.REVENUEID left join dbo.REVENUEPAYMENTMETHOD rpm on payment.FINANCIALTRANSACTIONID = rpm.REVENUEID -- this gives us the payment method of the RG left join dbo.CONSTITUENT c on c.ID = s.CONSTITUENTID left join dbo.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENT sc on sc.ID = s.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID left join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so ON so.ID = s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID left join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD soc ON soc.ID = so.ID where (currentStatus.[DESCRIPTION] = 'Prospect Sponsored' and s.STARTDATE <= dateadd(d, -60, getdate()) and (rgactivity.AMOUNT = 0 or rgactivity.AMOUNT is null) -- payment received? and (rpm.PAYMENTMETHODCODE in (1, 9) or rpm.PAYMENTMETHODCODE is null) -- paymethod is Cash and soc.ID IS NOT NULL -- only Children Sponsorships and s.STATUSCODE = 1 -- active -- We don't want any sponsors that have the Prevent Auto Cancel constituency code. and dbo.USR_UFN_CONSTITUENT_HAS_CONSTITUENCYCODE(s.CONSTITUENTID, (select ID from dbo.constituencycode where [DESCRIPTION] = 'Prevent Auto Cancel')) = 0 )
